message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $200. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $120 is a bit too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $160?
I'm not willing to go up to $160. I was thinking more like $140. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
